title: False Murder Accusations - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/15/19
itunes:title: False Murder Accusations - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/15/19
description:
George Noory and investigative journalist Edward Humes discuss his book involving a case of a woman accused of killing her children in a house fire, who may have been convicted using faulty evidence.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
